Punabbasumitta：1．Punabbasumitta．A rich merchant in the time of Vipassī Buddha．He built a monastery，one yojana in extent，on the site of Jetavana，the ground of which he bought by covering the whole with golden bricks．J．i．94； Bu．xx．30； DA．ii．424．

2．Punabbasumitta．Son of Sumedha Buddha．BuA．163； the Bu．（xii．20） calls him Sumitta．
